```{r, include = F}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Load data
```{r}
dfshrub <- read_excel("~/../Dropbox (Stephens Lab)/Shrub_experiment/Data/Compiled/ShrubCov_compiled_20171108.xlsx")
```

# Rename columns
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  rename(cov_cm = `cover (cm)`) %>% 
  rename(ht_cm = `ht (cm)`)
```

# Make everything uppercase
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  mutate(island = toupper(island))
```


# Take out gaps for now
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  filter(spp != "gap" & spp != "Gap")
summary(as.factor(dfshrub$spp))
summary(as.numeric(dfshrub$ht_cm))
dfshrub$ht_cm <- as.numeric(dfshrub$ht_cm)
```

# Calculate shrubarea for each transect and species
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  mutate(shrubarea = cov_cm*ht_cm)
dfshrub
```

# Sum shrubarea for the whole plot
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  group_by(Compartment, island, plot) %>% 
  summarise(shrubarea = sum(shrubarea))
summary(dfshrub$shrubarea)
```

# Take a look
```{r}
dfshrub
hist(dfshrub$shrubarea)
dfshrub %>% 
  group_by(Compartment, island) %>% 
  summarise(n())
```

# Rename to match seedling columns
```{r}
dfshrub <- dfshrub %>% 
  rename(compartment = Compartment)
```

# Save
```{r}
write.csv(dfshrub, file = "~/../Dropbox (Stephens Lab)/Shrub_experiment/Data/JOINED_DATA/dfshrub.csv", row.names = F)
```
